metadata.title: CVE-2015-8367 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The phase_one_correct function in Libraw before 0.17.1 allows attackers tocause memory errors and possibly execute arbitrary code, related to memoryobject initialization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.2-1
libraw16 - 0.18.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
exactimage package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
rawtherapee package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
